channel.title: Eternal Flame 3.0 Beta (Need testers & staff)
channel.description:
Hello, I am happy to announce the development of Eternal Flame 3.0
About us: We've came a long way from different server bases and revisions to pick and choose the right one for our community. We have decided to go to old school revision. We currently are in beta and would like to release clients to certain players of the public. We strive for excellence and quality, player service and satisfaction is our motivation, player suggested content and unique never before seen features is our mission.
We follow by: Rules keep organization, organization keeps order. That being said, were stable and professional.
What we are hiring for - Ingame Positions: -Support -Mod -Developer also in need of Forum mods.
You can contact my skype by rizen255 You can contact me by our eternal website - www.eternal-flames.enjin.com You can contact me ingame by downloading our client - https://www.dropbox.com/s/uzgqzy6j8q9mfdr/Eternal%20Beta.jar?dl=0
-Features- Loyalty titles support ranks staff openings account infractions account mac bans improved stable great economy hard to get certain things make you feel more accomplished. ZERO dupes new rank crowns Boss pets such as kree, bandos, etc.. (all our bosses) OSRS items such as blow pipe from zulrah Achievements complex third age weapons sword, crossbow boss logs - keeep track of your progress npcs logs - ^ Working donator scrolls donator zones from regular to extreme. OSRS bosses from scorpia to venenatis NO summoning or dungeoneering (may implement later)
and thats just some of the features, theres more come see for yourself.
Pictures - Coming soon

item.title: Eternal Flame 3.0 Beta (Need testers & staff)
item.dc:creator: @flame255 flame255
item.description:
@flame255 wrote:

Hello, I am happy to announce the development of Eternal Flame 3.0

About us: We’ve came a long way from different server bases and revisions to pick and choose the right one for our community. We have decided to go to old school revision. We currently are in beta and would like to release clients to certain players of the public. We strive for excellence and quality, player service and satisfaction is our motivation, player suggested content and unique never before seen features is our mission.

We follow by: Rules keep organization, organization keeps order.
That being said, were stable and professional.

What we are hiring for -
Ingame Positions:
-Support
-Mod
-Developer
also in need of Forum mods.

You can contact my skype by rizen255
You can contact me by our eternal website - www.eternal-flames.enjin.com
You can contact me ingame by downloading our client - https://www.dropbox.com/s/uzgqzy6j8q9mfdr/Eternal%20Beta.jar?dl=0

-Features-
Loyalty titles
support ranks
staff openings
account infractions
account mac bans improved
stable
great economy hard to get certain things make you feel more accomplished.
ZERO dupes
new rank crowns
Boss pets such as kree, bandos, etc… (all our bosses)
OSRS items such as blow pipe from zulrah
Achievements complex
third age weapons sword, crossbow
boss logs - keeep track of your progress
npcs logs - ^
Working donator scrolls
donator zones from regular to extreme.
OSRS bosses from scorpia to venenatis
NO summoning or dungeoneering (may implement later)

and thats just some of the features, theres more come see for yourself.

Pictures - Coming soon

Read full topic
